messages.content: A cat is an animal and mammal. It has fur, tail, and whiskers.
I don't know much about dogs yet. Can you tell me about it?
I don't know much about birds yet. Can you tell me about it?
A dog is a loyal animal that barks and wags its tail
I've learned about a dog - thank you! What else can you tell me?
A dog is an animal and mammal. It has fur, tail, and paws.
A bird is an animal with feathers that can fly
I've learned about a bird - thank you! What else can you tell me?
I'm curious about birds. What can you share?
A bird is an animal. It has feathers, wings, and beak.
